sentences.en: Didn't I ever expostulate with you on the subject?
sentences.cn: 我不曾就这问题忠告过你 吗 ?

sentences.en: Didn't you ever expostulate with her on the subject?
sentences.cn: 你不曾就这个问题忠告过她 吗 ?

sentences.en: For a moment I thought she was going to expostulate.
sentences.cn: 那一刻，我以为她要提出异议。

sentences.en: He wanted to plunge in and expostulate with her.
sentences.cn: 他想要单刀直入,劝告她.

sentences.en: I expostulate with her on the impropriety.
sentences.cn: 因行为不当我向她提出告诫.

sentences.en: Sons feel unreasonable, expostulate with simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 儿子们觉得不像话, 一齐劝谏.
